channel.title: Series on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Blowfish

item.title: Series
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description: Blowfish provides a feature to group a set of articles together under a “series”. Placing an article under a series will display the rest of the series articles in each single page and provide a quick way to navigate amongst them. You can see an example of this above.
